wikitext.*:
[[File:Quentandil - Gondolin Map.png|thumb|Map of Gondolin showing the Way in the southern part]]
The '''Fountains of the South''' were fountains in [[Gondolin]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. They were located south of the city, along the [[Way of Running Waters]]. Passing them were the walls, where [[Tuor]]'s house was. The [[people of the Fountain]] came from the south of the city when summoned, so they probably dwelt nearby.<ref>{{LT2|III}}, pp. 173, 186</ref>
